mapper.sql: create_user, create_time, modify_user, modify_time, is_deleted, id, job_fair_company_id, career_talk_title, start_time, end_time, career_talk_desc, status
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT cjfc.id job_fair_company_id, cj.year_level_id year_id, ct2.type_name year_name, cj.quarter, cj.start_time job_fair_start_time, cj.end_time job_fair_end_time, cjfc.job_fair_id, cjfc.company_id, cj.job_fair_title, cjfc.campus_id, ct.type_name campus_name, cc.id, cc.career_talk_title, cc.start_time, cc.end_time, cc.career_talk_desc FROM crim_job_fair_company cjfc INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON cjfc.job_fair_id = cj.id INNER JOIN crim_type ct2 ON cj.year_level_id = ct2.id INNER JOIN crim_type ct ON cjfc.campus_id = ct.id LEFT JOIN crim_career_talk cc ON cjfc.id = cc.job_fair_company_id AND cc.is_deleted = 0 WHERE cjfc.is_deleted = 0 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name, cj.id job_fair_id, cj.job_fair_title, cj.quarter,ct2.type_name campus_name, cs.site_name, cs.site_desc, cjfc.company_id, cc.company_name, cct.id, cct.career_talk_title, cct.start_time, cct.end_time, star.id star_id, star.student_id star_student_id, ccts.id career_talk_student_id, ccts.student_id cts_student_id FROM crim_type ct INNER JOIN crim_job_fair cj ON ct.id = cj.year_level_id AND cj.is_deleted = 0 INNER JOIN crim_job_fair_company cjfc ON cj.id = cjfc.job_fair_id AND cjfc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_type ct2 ON cjfc.campus_id = ct2.id LEFT JOIN crim_site cs ON cjfc.site_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN crim_company cc ON cjfc.company_id = cc.id AND cc.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_career_talk cct ON cjfc.id = cct.job_fair_company_id AND cct.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN crim_star star ON cc.id = star.company_id AND star.is_deleted = 0 AND star.student_id = #{studentId} LEFT JOIN crim_career_talk_student ccts ON cct.id = ccts.career_talk_id AND ccts.is_deleted = 0 AND ccts.student_id = #{studentId} WHERE ct.pid = 5 AND ct.is_deleted = 0 ) t1 ${ew.customSqlSegment}
